jumbo-episode.episodeDescription: Yearning to feel closer to her late mother and surprise her long-distance boyfriend, Kitty sets her sights on attending a prestigious school in Seoul.
A jet-lagged Kitty can't wait to see Dae, but their long-awaited reunion goes awry due to dormitory complications and the fallout from a viral video.
Dae experiences conflicting emotions over a sudden change of plans as Kitty deals with her own tangled feelings and an unfortunate new nickname.
Kitty joins Q's outdoor clib to connect with Dae away from school, but a clue about her mom soon sends her on a fact-finding -- and matchmaking -- mission.
With no plans for the Chuseok holiday, Kitty attempts to prepare a special feast for other students on campus with help from an unlikely source.
Drama erupts and romantic connections emerge at Min Ho's swanky party, where a determined Kitty intends to work through her feelings about Dae.
Tensions turn into revelations during a Saturday detention session after Kitty reluctantly agrees to help Yuri figure out what Principal Jina is hiding.
A School trip gives Dae a chance to regain Kitty's as Yuri opens up about Juliana, Florian confides in Q, and Min Ho makes a relationship decision.
With finals approaching, Kitty leans on her friends for extra help, but tempers flare at KISS and beyond amid bombshells, betrayals and blazing fights.
Final grades, class rangkings and complicated truths cause emotions to run high as Kitty takes a stand with her future at KISS hanging in the balance.

jumbo.title: XO. KITTY
jumbo.description: A young woman named Kitty Song Covey moves to Seoul to attend school and reunite with her long-distance boyfriend. However, she soon finds herself caught up in a web of love, friendship, and betrayal.
jumbo.creator: Jenny Han

top-ten.title: Business Proposal
top-ten.description: A young woman goes on a blind date with a wealthy CEO, only to discover that he is her company's biggest client. The two agree to keep their relationship a secret, but things quickly become complicated.
top-ten.creator: Director X

top-ten.title: Hometown Cha-Cha-Cha
top-ten.description: A dentist from Seoul moves to a seaside town and meets a handyman who helps her adjust to her new life.
top-ten.creator: Shin Ha-eun

top-ten.title: The Good Bad Mother
top-ten.description: A single mother raises her son with the goal of keeping him from living a life as difficult as her own. However, a tragic accident leaves her son with the mind of a child, forcing her to confront her own past and learn to love her son again.
top-ten.creator: Sim Na-yeon

top-ten.title: Dr. Romantic
top-ten.description: Dr. Romantic is a South Korean medical drama television series that aired on SBS from November 7, 2016 to January 16, 2017. The series stars Han Suk-kyu, Yoo Yeon-seok, and Seo Hyun-jin. The series follows the story of a genius doctor who is known for his unorthodox methods and his ability to save lives.
top-ten.creator: Lee Byung-hun

top-ten.title: Oshi No Ko
top-ten.description: A young doctor named Gorou Amemiya is a big fan of the idol Ai Hoshino. When she shows up at his hospital pregnant, he is beyond bewildered. Gorou promises her a safe delivery, but an encounter with a mysterious figure results in his untimely death—or so he thought. Gorou is reborn as Ai's child, and he soon finds himself caught up in the world of show business.
top-ten.creator: Aka Akasaka

top-ten.title: The Tale Of The Nine Tailed
top-ten.description: A nine-tailed fox who has lived for centuries falls in love with a human woman.
top-ten.creator: Kang Shin-Hyo

top-ten.title: Partners for Justice
top-ten.description: A forensic doctor and a prosecutor team up to solve a series of murders.
top-ten.creator: No Do-cheol

top-ten.title: Nevertheless
top-ten.description: An uncertain romance begins between Yoo Na-bi, a heartbroken woman who no longer believes in love, and Park Jae-eon, a flirtatious man who does not want to commit to a relationship.
top-ten.creator: Kim Ga-Ram

top-ten.title: My Name
top-ten.description: A woman who joins a crime syndicate to avenge her father's death, only to discover that she has been working for the very people who killed him.
top-ten.creator: Kim Jin-min

romance.title: Twenty-Five Twenty-One
romance.description: A love story between a fencing prodigy and a man who loses his dream.
romance.creator: Lee Jong-hyo

romance.title: It's Okay to Not Be Okay
romance.description: A story about a man employed in a psychiatric ward and a woman, with an antisocial personality disorder, who is a popular writer of children's books.
romance.creator: Park Shin-woo

romance.title: Our Beloved Summer
romance.description: A former couple who broke up after a bitter fight reunite 10 years later when they are forced to film a documentary together.
romance.creator: Kim Yoon-jin

romance.title: Hotel Del Luna
romance.description: A hotel that caters to ghosts, run by a beautiful but cursed woman and a young man who is cursed to work there.
romance.creator: Hong sisters

romance.title: While You Were Sleeping
romance.description: A woman who can see the future and a prosecutor with a strong sense of justice team up to prevent crimes from happening.
romance.creator: Park Hye-ryeon

romance.title: Goblin
romance.description: A goblin who has been cursed with immortality and a grim reaper who has lost his memories team up to find the goblin's bride, who can break the curse.
romance.creator: Kim Eun-sook

romance.title: Youth of May
romance.description: A love story set against the backdrop of the Gwangju Uprising in 1980.
romance.creator: Lee Kyung-mi

romance.title: Your Lie in April
romance.description: A story about a young pianist who loses his ability to play after a traumatic event and a girl who helps him find his way back to music.
romance.creator: Naoshi Arakawa

sliceoflife.title: Business Proposal
sliceoflife.description: A young woman goes on a blind date with a wealthy CEO, only to discover that he is her company's biggest client. The two agree to keep their relationship a secret, but things quickly become complicated.
sliceoflife.creator: Director X

sliceoflife.title: Hospital Playlist
sliceoflife.description: A heartwarming story about five doctors who are best friends and their lives at work and at home.
sliceoflife.creator: Shin Won-ho

sliceoflife.title: K-On!
sliceoflife.description: A slice-of-life anime about a high school girl who joins the light music club and discovers her love of music.
sliceoflife.creator: Naoko Yamada

sliceoflife.title: Vincenzo
sliceoflife.description: A Korean-Italian mafia consigliere named Vincenzo Cassano returns to South Korea after his boss is killed. He teams up with a lawyer to take down a corrupt corporation.
sliceoflife.creator: Kim Hee-won

sliceoflife.title: Summer Strike
sliceoflife.description: A group of friends go on a summer vacation to a beach house, only to discover that they are not alone.
sliceoflife.creator: Kim Tae-yoon

sliceoflife.title: Crash Course In Romance
sliceoflife.description: A young woman who has never been in love takes a crash course in romance from her best friend.
sliceoflife.creator: Park Shin-woo

sliceoflife.title: Reply 1988
sliceoflife.description: A coming-of-age story about a group of friends who grow up together in Seoul in the 1980s.
sliceoflife.creator: Lee Woo-jung

sliceoflife.title: My Liberation Notes
sliceoflife.description: Three siblings and their neighbor try to find their own versions of liberation from the everyday life that makes them feel trapped.
sliceoflife.creator: Park Hae-young

crime.title: Vincenzo
crime.description: A Korean-Italian mafia consigliere named Vincenzo Cassano returns to South Korea after his boss is killed. He teams up with a lawyer to take down a corrupt corporation.
crime.creator: Kim Hee-won

crime.title: Partners for Justice
crime.description: A forensic doctor and a prosecutor team up to solve a series of murders.
crime.creator: No Do-cheol

crime.title: My Name
crime.description: A woman who joins a crime syndicate to avenge her father's death, only to discover that she has been working for the very people who killed him.
crime.creator: Kim Jin-min

crime.title: The Glory
crime.description: A woman seeks revenge on the high school teacher who sexually assaulted her and ruined her life.
crime.creator: Kim Ji-soo

crime.title: Money Heist
crime.description: A group of thieves take hostages and lock themselves in the Royal Mint of Spain as a heist is being carried out.
crime.creator: Álex Pina

crime.title: Vagabond
crime.description: A stuntman investigates the cause of a plane crash that killed his niece, only to uncover a government conspiracy.
crime.creator: Kim Hee-won

crime.title: Reborn Rich
crime.description: A man who was born into poverty and raised in an orphanage suddenly finds himself inheriting a large fortune from a long-lost grandfather.
crime.creator: Kim Hyung-seok

crime.title: Lupin
crime.description: A modern-day thief who steals from the rich and gives to the poor, inspired by the adventures of Arsène Lupin, a gentleman thief from French literature.
crime.creator: George Kay

new-and-popular.title: Miracle In Cell no.7
new-and-popular.description: This warmhearted comedy relates the story of Yong-gu, a mentally challanged father who's wrongly jailed for the murder of a young girl.
new-and-popular.creator: Christopher Alden

new-and-popular.title: The Good Bad Mother
